titleStmt.title: A new, rare, and exellent [sic] sonnet of a brave and lusty youth full groome, that was in love and could not tell with whom. To the tune of, Bodkins galiard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. C. J. W. T. V. W. G.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You gentile nimphs that on the meddowes play,".
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: F. C. J. W. T. V. W. G.
